title: Redbox Clone
description: Angular4 to emulate Redbox dvd rental kiosk

title: Card Games
description: This project includes two card games: Blackjack and Sikou. Needless to say, Blackjack is a well-known card game. Sikou is the first Cambodian card game written in JavaScript. The project was written in a custom JavaScript MVC pattern. It was designed to make the code reusable and extensible.

title: Khmer Tube
description: This single page application is built with Angular, JavaScript, Youtube API. The application targets Cambodian users who like to watch local news and entertainment.

title: Device Emulator
description: This simple application allow you to change the skin for different devices: Android Phone, iPhone and iPad, and scale proportionally to device width and height. Angular Directive: https://github.com/rattanakchea/device-emulator

title: Monopoly Checker
description: This application helps users keeping track of Monopoly tickets and their winning prize. It was built within 3 days. Technology: AngularJS, localStrage, JavaScript.

title: Mini Trello
description: Build a todo app in a day with Angular + Firebase with user email authentication. Tech: Angular, Firebase, Unit Testing, Jasmine, Grunt.

title: Google Keep Clone
description: Google Keep Clone provides CRUD operations for note-taking. I used OOP PHP to build a web service supporting GET, POST, PUT, and UPDATE requests. For front end, I used Angular JS for tempting and using $http service to manage requests. The MaterializeCSS framework provides modern, beautiful interface. By separating server, client and database layer, the business logic can be separated from presentation. This allows me to extend applications or build mobile application in the future.

title: BookmarkEd Android App
description: Buyer and Seller community for buying and selling textbooks. Team project of four. I was responsible for functional development and some UI components

title: Memory Game
description: Memory Game is fun pairing game in which the goal is to find the matching pair of images. The project was built with Javascript, Jquery to interact with Youtube V3 and TheMovieDB APIs.

title: Raddit on Rails
description: Ruby on Rails application with User Authentication, URL Links, Comments and voting systems, deployed on Heroku.

title: Hangman
description: Classic yet fun hangman game, guess a country or a movie actor

title: PHP-Database CMS
description: Content Management System using Object oriented PHP using PDO to connect to SQLite. Login with username(admin) and password(pass) to test the demo.

title: Appointment Booking Application

title: Library Manager

title: Simple Todo List

title: Lucid Media
description: LUCIDMEDIA was born at a late-night after party at the Palm Springs Film Festival, over diet cokes, a shared love for the craft and science of filmmaking, and an aversion to mediocrity. Founders Gina Leonard and Dan Strickland combined forces, harnessing decades of experience working with blue-chip brands from around the globe.

Work with client to improve sitewide UX
